item.title: On Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE)
item.description: Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering is designed to test your basics in engineering. It has nothing to do with experiences in industries. By engineering basics, I mean your core courses. You must know them. I was bit troubled with all these mushrooming of GATE coaching centres on the line of JEE and the way they ‘buy’ opinion to suit their business, so I am writing this. I am pretty sure that one can succeed in exams without using these centre.
